title: Remove in-app simulation/fake disclosures and neutralize branding copy

requirements.summary: Remove all user-facing UI copy that describes the app as a simulation/fake/virtual/demo product and replace with neutral product language.
acceptanceCriteria: The dashboard no longer shows the 'Simulation Notice' alert and no other notice/disclosure about simulation/fake/virtual appears on the dashboard.
The login screen no longer contains 'Simulation Notice' content and does not use the words 'simulated', 'fake', or 'virtual' in its welcome/description text.
The digital card UI no longer shows 'Simulated Card' and the below-card caption no longer states it is simulated or for demonstration purposes.
The Add Money dialog description no longer references a 'simulated balance' (or equivalent) and uses neutral language.
A quick text search across frontend source for common disclosure terms (at minimum: 'simulation', 'simulated', 'fake', 'virtual', 'demonstration') finds no remaining user-facing UI strings.

file_operations.description: Update the logged-out (login) screen copy to remove any simulation/fake/virtual/demo wording; remove the 'Simulation Notice' block entirely and replace with neutral onboarding text that refers only to a digital card and balance.

Remove the dashboard 'Simulation Notice' Alert and any other simulation/fake/virtual/demo disclosure copy; revise the informational section so its heading and bullets use neutral product language (no simulation/fake/virtual/demo references). Also clean up unused imports/icons caused by removing the notice UI.
Replace the 'Simulated Card' label with neutral wording (e.g., 'Digital Card') and rewrite/remove the below-card caption so it no longer mentions simulated or demonstration purposes.
Update the Add Money dialog description text to remove references to a simulated/virtual balance and use neutral language (e.g., adding to your balance).
Update profile setup dialog description text to remove any mention of 'simulated' and keep the onboarding language neutral (digital card + balance only).

requirements.summary: Update the base document title to remove 'Fake'/'Simulated' wording and use a neutral app title.
acceptanceCriteria: The <title> in frontend/index.html does not contain 'Fake' or 'Simulated'.
The browser tab title renders the updated neutral title when the app loads.

file_operations.description: Change the document <title> to a neutral English title consistent with the app branding (remove any 'Fake'/'Simulated' wording).
